text: The Guy Who Came Back is a 1951 American drama movie directed by Joseph M. Newman and based on the story by W.G. Fay. It stars Paul Douglas, Linda Darnell, Joan Bennett, Don DeFore and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph M. Newman Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: The Guy Who Came Back
